definition: so that/so as to/in order to
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards

sentences.english: Many teachers are waiting for new replacements before retiring.
sentences.chinese: 許多教師正在等候新進人員，以便退休。

sentences.english: He raised the child up in order to let him reach the branch.
sentences.chinese: 他將孩子舉高以便讓他夠得着樹枝。

sentences.english: He bought an English-Chinese dictionary in order to look up the words he doesn't know.
sentences.chinese: 他買了本英漢字典，以便查找他不認識的單詞。

sentences.english: The 2.6.25 implementation will need to walk the retransmission queue from the start in order to find this data.
sentences.chinese: 的實現需要從起點遍歷重傳隊列以便找到數據。

sentences.english: You can also export the test classes to run in Integration Edition.
sentences.chinese: 您還可以導出測試類以便在集成版中運行它們。

sentences.english: The guy warned me that you have to knock on the door first to scatter them away.
sentences.chinese: 店員警告我說開門前最好先敲敲門，以便把它們嚇跑。

sentences.english: The rear door hinges/is hinged at the top so that it opens upwards.
sentences.chinese: 後面的門是在頂部鉸接上的，以便可以向上開。

sentences.english: DRAIN】You should dig trenches to drain away the water.
He sent the letter by air mail, so that it might reach them in good time.
sentences.chinese: 我用航空郵件發出這封信，以便他們及早收到。

sentences.english: I wanted to put him on awareness so that he could possiblcdfds. com prepare going into next season.
sentences.chinese: 我想讓他意識到點，以便爲下一賽季做。

sentences.english: Secure all work with clamps or a vise, freeing both hands to operate tools.
sentences.chinese: 使用夾鉗或虎鉗固定工件，以便空出雙手來操作工具。

sentences.english: Enter the password for the Administrator account, then re-enter it as confirmation.
sentences.chinese: 輸入管理員帳號密碼，然後重新輸入以便確認。

sentences.english: The machines were dismounted for shipping.
sentences.chinese: 這些機器被拆卸下來以便裝運。

sentences.english: Giovanni leaned out of the window so he could see her better.
sentences.chinese: 喬瓦尼把頭探出窗外，以便他能看到她的好。

sentences.english: This lot should be treed so that the house will be shaded in summer.
sentences.chinese: 這片地應當種上樹，以便使房子在夏天處於陰涼之中。

sentences.english: They arrived early in order that they might get a good seat.
sentences.chinese: 他們趕早而來以便能有個好座位。

definition: as far as possible/to do one's utmost
must/to need to/to be sure to
(so as) to avoid/to prevent/(just) in case
in order to avoid/so as not to
at the earliest possible time/as soon as possible
to prevent/to guard against/to take precautions
